title: United Kingdom
description: In July 2010 my family took a trip to the UK where we drove from London up into Scotland and then back down.

photos.description: Underneath Tower Bridge. Apparently not falling down.
A very hairy cow. I'd like a better picture, but the only time we saw them closer it was very dark.
Hadrian's wall in a field of sheep (not pictured). Pretty good framing I think.
